name: Who Saw My Stressball
description:
This is a project I made as a way to get back into game development. Been out of it for a while and wanted to make something simple in under one week.
If the game lags, make sure you have enabled WebGL in your browser settings!

*And yes, I'm aware that the "game over" text is a bit cropped out hah. Still figuring out how itch.io works :)

*Also realized that I implemented a quit button for a browser only game.. Well, it's there if you want to press it. (Not that it does anything really)

Have a good one! :D
